nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 101 is the one hundred first issue of the Marvel Star Wars UK series of comic books.
This issue reprints the second of four parts of the story printed in the US as Star Wars Annual 1.

The comic also includes the first part of a brand-new section called Star Profile featuring Mark Hamill alongside a study of his carrer until 1978 including the soon to-be-released The Empire Strikes Back.
